name: Sum.Lex.inl_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeSup α
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup β
a₁ a₂ : α
⊢ Eq (Sum.inlₗ (Max.max a₁ a₂)) (Max.max (Sum.inlₗ a₁) (Sum.inlₗ a₂))
decl: @[simp] lemma inl_sup (a₁ a₂ : α) : (inlₗ (a₁ ⊔ a₂) : α ⊕ β) = inlₗ a₁ ⊔ inlₗ a₂ := rfl

name: Sum.Lex.inr_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeSup α
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup β
b₁ b₂ : β
⊢ Eq (Sum.inrₗ (Max.max b₁ b₂)) (Max.max (Sum.inrₗ b₁) (Sum.inrₗ b₂))
decl: @[simp] lemma inr_sup (b₁ b₂ : β) : (inrₗ (b₁ ⊔ b₂) : α ⊕ β) = inrₗ b₁ ⊔ inrₗ b₂ := rfl

name: Sum.Lex.inl_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf α
inst✝ : SemilatticeInf β
a₁ a₂ : α
⊢ Eq (Sum.inlₗ (Min.min a₁ a₂)) (Min.min (Sum.inlₗ a₁) (Sum.inlₗ a₂))
decl: @[simp] lemma inl_inf (a₁ a₂ : α) : (inlₗ (a₁ ⊓ a₂) : α ⊕ β) = inlₗ a₁ ⊓ inlₗ a₂ := rfl

name: Sum.Lex.inr_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf α
inst✝ : SemilatticeInf β
b₁ b₂ : β
⊢ Eq (Sum.inrₗ (Min.min b₁ b₂)) (Min.min (Sum.inrₗ b₁) (Sum.inrₗ b₂))
decl: @[simp] lemma inr_inf (b₁ b₂ : β) : (inrₗ (b₁ ⊓ b₂) : α ⊕ β) = inrₗ b₁ ⊓ inrₗ b₂ := rfl
